item.title: "Take That Nigger Off The TV, We Wanna Watch Football!": Idiots Respond To NBC Pre-Empting Sunday Night Football
item.description: Here's a sampling of the morons--many of them racist--who are angry NBC pre-empted football to show Obama's speech http://t.co/QtFAoxb9
item.content:encoded: Here's a sampling of the morons--many of them racist--who are angry NBC pre-empted football to show Obama's speech http://t.co/QtFAoxb9 NBC pre-empted the first quarter of tonight's 49ers-Patriots game to show President Obama's speech at the Newtown memorial for victims of the Sandy Hook shooting. As you might expect, many football fans didn't take kindly to this. (So, too, some Bob's Burgers fans.) Here are those idiots, led by someone who claims to be a Division I football player in the state of Alabama. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: deadspin.com

item.title: Former Ed Secretary: Arm School Employees
item.description: Arm schools! Arm mall employees! Arm theater employees! Arm college students! Arm everyone!!! http://t.co/ogaqLefB #tcot #p2 ridiculous
item.content:encoded: Arm schools! Arm mall employees! Arm theater employees! Arm college students! Arm everyone!!! http://t.co/ogaqLefB #tcot #p2 ridiculous In the wake of the Newtown, Conn., mass shooting that claimed 26 lives Friday, former Education Secretary Bill Bennett said Sunday that schools should possibly consider arming certain employees to prevent attacks. "Let's remember the good things here: the heroism of those teachers and that principal," Bennett said on "Meet the Press." Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.content:encoded: 山本太郎氏、２分で落選 人生初の円形脱毛症に…衆院選 - スポーツ報知: 東京８区で落選が決定的になった山本太郎氏。右側頭部には円形脱毛症も見られた. 東京８区から無所属で出馬した山本太郎氏（３８… http://t.co/eyGagExU 東京８区から無所属で出馬した山本太郎氏（３８）は、開票直後に、同選挙区の自民党・石原伸晃氏（５５）に敗れ、あえなく落選となった。今月１日に政治団体「新党　今はひとり」を立ち上げ、脱原発などをマニフェ Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Agents visit Conn. gun shops after school massacre
item.description: Investigators visit Connecticut gun shops and ranges as townspeople seek comfort in faith: http://t.co/exSCSoI1 -JM #Newtown
item.content:encoded: Investigators visit Connecticut gun shops and ranges as townspeople seek comfort in faith: http://t.co/exSCSoI1 -JM #Newtown NEWTOWN, Conn. (AP) — Federal agents plan to fan out to gun stores and shooting ranges across Connecticut seeking clues to the life of the gunman who killed 26 children and adults in an elementary school.Residents of Newtown are preparing for church services Sunday and a visit by President Barack Obama. He is scheduled to attend an interfaith vigil in the evening.But as residents seek comfort, investigators continue their work. Among the things they want to know: Why did the gunman's mother keep a cache of high-power weapons in the house? What experience did Lanza have with those guns?And, above all, what set him on a path to the massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary School? Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: ap.org

item.title: GOP Congressman: More Guns The Answer
item.description: Louie Gohmert Says More Guns Are Answer To Preventing Mass Killings: WASHINGTON -- In the wake of the mass killi... http://t.co/Siu0QbOD
item.content:encoded: Louie Gohmert Says More Guns Are Answer To Preventing Mass Killings: WASHINGTON -- In the wake of the mass killi... http://t.co/Siu0QbOD WASHINGTON -- In the wake of the mass killing that claimed 26 children and adults at a Connecticut elementary school Friday, Rep. Louie Gohmert (R-Texas) made the case Sunday that the answer to preventing massacres in the U.S. is for more Americans to carry guns. "There has been great investigation and study into this," Gohmert told Chris Wallace on Fox News Sunday, arguing that mass killings happen where citizens tend to be unarmed. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.title: I Am Adam Lanza's Mother
item.description: http://t.co/fRH35Zdp
item.content:encoded: http://t.co/fRH35Zdp Three days before 20 year-old Adam Lanza killed his mother, then opened fire on a classroom full of Connecticut kindergartners, my 13-year old son Michael (name changed) missed his bus because he was wearing the wrong color pants. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Anonymous Attacks Westboro Baptist Church Over Sandy Hook Funeral Protest http://t.co/m9RUg1l3 Following the Sandy Hook shooting tragedy, the Westboro Baptist Church is unsurprisingly stirring up controversy by doing one of the things they do best: being assholes and picketing funerals. Your friendly, faceless, neighborhood hacking group Anonymous has responded by doing what they do best: publishing private information, in this case, Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Worshippers flee Conn. church over threat report
item.description: Worshippers hurriedly leave a church in Newtown, Conn., saying there was a bomb threat: http://t.co/2C6wALfe -RAS
item.content:encoded: Worshippers hurriedly leave a church in Newtown, Conn., saying there was a bomb threat: http://t.co/2C6wALfe -RAS NEWTOWN, Conn. (AP) — Worshippers have hurriedly left a church in Newtown, Conn., saying there was a bomb threat.Police in SWAT gear arrived at the St. Rose of Lima Church not far from the elementary school where 20 kids and six adults were killed Friday.There was no official report from police about the threat or evacuation.It's not clear if there actually was a threat or if, like many tragedies, whether it was a hoax or the result of a community on edge. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: ap.org
